title: The Ring Doorbell Pro hits lowest price ever in Amazon's latest sale
author: mackenzie-frazier
summary: Score an $80 discount on the best-selling Ring Video Doorbell
article: We're sorted through Amazon's latest sale and spotted an incredible deal on the best-selling Ring Video Doorbell. Right now, you can get the Ring Doorbell Pro on sale for $169.99. That's an $80 discount and the lowest price we've found for the Alexa-enabled doorbell. Amazon also has the all-new Ring 3 on sale for $179.99 (was $199.99) and the Ring Video Doorbell 3 Plus marked down to $199.99 (was $229.99).

The Ring Doorbell Pro allows you to monitor your property in HD video and check-in anytime with live on-demand video. Unlike previous models, the Pro offers advanced motion detection with the ability to customize your motion zones to focus on areas that are most important to you. The Ring doorbell will also send alerts to your smartphone, laptop, or tablet when motion is detected and offers two-way talk. As we've mentioned above, this is the lowest price we've found for the Ring Pro and a rare deal on the best-selling video doorbell. We don't know how long Amazon will have the Ring Pro on sale, so you should take advantage now before it's too late.
